description.value:
These masks are always decorated with at least one wide, staring eye. The first time each day a creature on your plane that you can't perceive targets you with a divination spell, the creature must attempt a @Check[type:will|dc:24|name:Mask of the Cursed Eye|traits:invested,magical,necromancy] save. This effect is automatic and does not require you to Activate the item.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The creature is unaffected. You know you've been targeted with a divination spell, but the mask gives you no additional information.

Failure The creature is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Sickened]{Sickened 1} and @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Dazzled]{Dazzled} for 1 minute. You know you've been targeted with a divination spell, but the mask gives you no additional information.

Critical Failure The creature is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Sickened]{Sickened 2} and dazzled for 10 minutes, and the spell is disrupted. You gain a brief mental glimpse of the triggering creature and learn its approximate distance and direction.
